body_html:
Hello, sorry for the (considerable) delay. We're working on a new implementation of tf.while_loop that will hopefully have fewer bugs like this, or at least be easier to debug. It's still under development, but eventually this will replace the current while_loop implementation.

To try out the new implementation, set the environment variable TF_ENABLE_WHILE_V2=1 (you can also set TF_ENABLE_COND_V2=1 to try out the corresponding new implementation of tf.cond, also under development).

@saxenasaurabh tried @verinov with the new implementations and it worked.
@matthew-z and @JulienSiems, can you try your use cases with these env vars enabled?
Unfortunately we don't have the bandwidth to fix the original implementation, which is very hard to debug (as you can see from our long silence...).
